author: Staff Reporter
text: A Special Court for CBI cases here on Friday granted police custody of S. Durga Prasad, Regional Commissioner (Chennai Region), Employees Provident Fund Organisation till January 25. The CBI had arrested Durga Prasad and six others in connection with a corruption case. The agency made the arrest based on inputs received by its Anti-Corruption Branch that Mr. Prasad had demanded Rs.25 lakh as bribe for favouring an educational institutions’ group to subterfuge of wages paid to employees for the purpose of PF deduction/remittance.
title: Arrested official in police custody
